title: Hillary VS Trump : Who Would Sri Lanka Have Voted For?
abstract: How Lankans would vote in the US elections!
content:
The world is in a frothing frenzy, watching the most morbid reality show of all time - the US Presidential Elections. November 9th is here, as is the reckoning. Ironically, this is 9/11 for the rest of the world.
You may think that either outcome wouldn't affect Sri Lanka, but it would. A
, and a
during her term as Secretary of State. Only time will tell. Either way, you can't vote. But if you could, who would it be?
